Open main floor layout is great for entertaining, plus the 2 good sized bedrooms, a 3 pc bath with a tempered glass shower is easily accessible to principle rooms. The open tread fir staircase leads you to the second floor featuring a huge master bedroom, again with pine accented angled roof lines, a large walk-in closet and an ensuite to die for. The combined loft/office/library is a beautiful room. RV parking & possible rear detached garage compliment this nice home.
